title: Postpartum fitness program added to Apple Fitness+, a year after pregnancy exercises
content:
Apple Fitness+ is adding a postpartum fitness program to the service, a year after pregnancy workouts (such a shame it wasn’t nine months later… ).

The workouts are geared to new parents not just in the types of exercise offered, but also in the timings …

more…

The post Postpartum fitness program added to Apple Fitness+, a year after pregnancy exercises appeared first on 9to5Mac.
